definition[0]: a substance consisting of very small pieces of rocks and minerals, that forms beaches and deserts
example[0]: a mixture of sand and cement
example[1]: I have sand in my shoe.
example[3]: We were just sitting on the sand.
definition[2]: a substance that forms beaches and deserts, or an area of this substance
example[5]: He could see several small figures out on the sands.
definition[3]: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake
example[7]: How about a day at the beach?
definition[4]: a large area of land where it is always very hot and dry, and there is a lot of sand
example[10]: They crossed the desert by camel.
definition[5]: a hill made of sand near the sea or in the desert
example[11]: We went for a long walk along the dunes.
example[12]: The dunes are home to a wide variety of birds and plants.
definition[6]: to make a surface smooth by rubbing it with sandpaper or using a special piece of equipment
